phrases.pt: Isto é uma grande merda.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ɛ ˈumɐ ˈɡɾɐ̃dɨ ˈmɛɾdɐ

translations.text: This is complete bullshit.

phrases.pt: Estou farto desta porcaria toda.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou ˈfaɾtu ˈdɛʃtɐ puɾkɐˈɾiɐ ˈtodɐ

translations.text: I’m fed up with all this crap.

phrases.pt: Isto correu mesmo mal, foda-se.
phrases.ru: Всё реально пошло по пизде, блядь.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu kuˈʁew ˈmẽmu ˈmaɫ fɔˈdasɨ

translations.text: This went really fucking bad.

phrases.pt: Não percebo esta merda nenhuma.
phrases.ru: Я ни хрена не понимаю в этом дерьме.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w pɨɾˈsɛbu ˈɛʃtɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ nẽˈũmɐ

translations.text: I don’t understand this shit at all.

phrases.pt: Esta situação está a dar-me cabo dos nervos.
phrases.ru: Эта ситуация мне просто выносит мозг.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈɛʃtɐ sitwɐˈsɐ̃w ʃˈta ɐ daɾmɨ ˈkabu duʃ ˈnɛɾvuʃ

translations.text: This situation is driving me fucking crazy.

phrases.pt: Isto é uma palhaçada do caralho.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ɛ ˈumɐ pɐʎɐˈsadɐ du kɐˈʎaɾu

translations.text: This is a fucking joke.

phrases.pt: Estou completamente lixado hoje.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou kõplɨtɐˈmẽtɨ liˈʃadu ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: I’m completely fucked today.

phrases.pt: Que se foda, já não quero saber.
phrases.ru: Да пошло оно всё нахуй, мне уже плевать.
phrases.ipa_transcription: kɨ sɨ ˈfɔdɐ ʒa nɐ̃w ˈkɛɾu sɐˈbeɾ

translations.text: Fuck it, I don’t care anymore.

phrases.pt: Isto é mesmo para esquecer, foda-se.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ɛ ˈmẽmu pɐɾɐ ʃkɨˈseɾ fɔˈdasɨ

translations.text: This is really something to forget, fuck.

phrases.pt: Não tenho paciência para esta merda.
phrases.ru: У меня нет терпения на это дерьмо.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈtẽɲu pɐˈsjẽsjɐ pɐɾɐ ˈɛʃtɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ

translations.text: I have no patience for this shit.

phrases.pt: Estou cansado desta merda toda.
phrases.ru: Я устал от всего этого дерьма.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou kɐ̃ˈsadu ˈdɛʃtɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ ˈtodɐ

translations.text: I’m tired of all this shit.

phrases.pt: Isto está a correr como o caralho.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ʃˈta ɐ kuˈʁeɾ ˈkɔmu u kɐˈʎaɾu

translations.text: This is going to shit.

phrases.pt: Que merda de dia, a sério.
phrases.ipa_transcription: kɨ ˈmɛɾdɐ dɨ ˈdiɐ ɐ ˈsɛɾju

translations.text: What a shitty day, seriously.

phrases.pt: Não acredito nesta merda.
phrases.ru: Я не могу поверить в это дерьмо.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ɐkɾɨˈditu ˈnɛʃtɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ

translations.text: I can’t believe this shit.

phrases.pt: Isto não faz sentido nenhum, foda-se.
phrases.ru: Это вообще ни хуя не имеет смысла.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu nɐ̃w faʃ sĩˈtĩdu nẽˈũ fɔˈdasɨ

translations.text: This makes no fucking sense.

phrases.pt: Estou a perder a paciência com isto.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou ɐ pɨɾˈdeɾ ɐ pɐˈsjẽsjɐ kõ ˈiʃtu

translations.text: I’m losing my patience with this shit.

phrases.pt: Esta situação é uma merda pegada.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈɛʃtɐ sitwɐˈsɐ̃w ɛ ˈumɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ pɨˈɡadɐ

translations.text: This situation is pure shit.

phrases.pt: Não era suposto ser esta merda.
phrases.ru: Это вообще не должно было быть таким пиздецом.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈɛɾɐ suˈpɔʃtu seɾ ˈɛʃtɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ

translations.text: This wasn’t supposed to be this shit.

phrases.pt: Isto está a ir tudo pelo cano abaixo.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ʃˈta ɐ iɾ ˈtudu ˈpelu ˈkɐnu ɐˈbajʃu

translations.text: Everything is going down the drain.

phrases.pt: Estou mesmo farto desta situação.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou ˈmẽmu ˈfaɾtu ˈdɛʃtɐ sitwɐˈsɐ̃w

translations.text: I’m really fed up with this situation.

phrases.pt: Que puta de confusão, foda-se.
phrases.ipa_transcription: kɨ ˈputɐ dɨ kõfuˈzɐ̃w fɔˈdasɨ

translations.text: What a fucking mess.

phrases.pt: Isto está uma verdadeira merda.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ʃˈta ˈumɐ vɨɾdɐˈdɛjɾɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ

translations.text: This is a real piece of shit.

phrases.pt: Não sei que caralho fazer agora.
phrases.ru: Я не знаю, что, блядь, теперь делать.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈsɛj kɨ kɐˈʎaɾu fɐˈzeɾ ɐˈɡɔɾɐ

translations.text: I don’t know what the fuck to do now.

phrases.pt: Estou sem paciência para isto hoje.
phrases.ru: Сегодня у меня ноль терпения на это дерьмо.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou sẽ pɐˈsjẽsjɐ pɐɾɐ ˈiʃtu ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: I have zero patience for this today.

phrases.pt: Isto deu completamente para o torto.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ˈdew kõplɨtɐˈmẽtɨ pɐɾɐ u ˈtɔɾtu

translations.text: This went completely wrong.

phrases.pt: Que se lixe tudo, preciso de um tempo.
phrases.ru: Да пошло всё нахуй, мне нужен перерыв.
phrases.ipa_transcription: kɨ sɨ ˈliʃɨ ˈtudu pɾɨˈsizu dɨ ˈũ ˈtẽpu

translations.text: Fuck everything, I need some time.

phrases.pt: Esta merda está a repetir-se sempre.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈɛʃtɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ ʃˈta ɐ ʁɨpɨˈtiɾsɨ ˈsẽpɾɨ

translations.text: This shit keeps repeating itself.

phrases.pt: Estou mesmo à beira de explodir.
phrases.ru: Я реально на грани, сейчас взорвусь.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou ˈmẽmu a ˈbɐjɾɐ dɨ ʃpluˈdiɾ

translations.text: I’m really about to explode.

phrases.pt: Isto é stressante para caralho.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ɛ ʃtɾɨˈsɐ̃tɨ pɐɾɐ kɐˈʎaɾu

translations.text: This is fucking stressful.

phrases.pt: Já chega desta merda.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʒa ˈʃeɡɐ ˈdɛʃtɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ

translations.text: Enough of this shit.

phrases.pt: Não tenho energia para lidar com isto.
phrases.ru: У меня нет сил разбираться с этим дерьмом.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈtẽɲu ɨnɨɾˈʒiɐ pɐɾɐ liˈdaɾ kõ ˈiʃtu

translations.text: I don’t have the energy to deal with this shit.

phrases.pt: Isto está a sair completamente do controlo.
phrases.ru: Это всё выходит из-под контроля к хуям.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ʃˈta ɐ sɐˈiɾ kõplɨtɐˈmẽtɨ du kõˈtɾɔlu

translations.text: This is completely getting out of control.

phrases.pt: Estou cansado de levar com esta merda.
phrases.ru: Я устал всё это дерьмо на себе тащить.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou kɐ̃ˈsadu dɨ lɨˈvaɾ kõ ˈɛʃtɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ

translations.text: I’m tired of putting up with this shit.

phrases.pt: Que merda foi esta agora?
phrases.ipa_transcription: kɨ ˈmɛɾdɐ ˈfoj ˈɛʃtɐ ɐˈɡɔɾɐ

translations.text: What the fuck was that just now?

phrases.pt: Isto não pode ser sério, foda-se.
phrases.ru: Это не может быть серьёзно, блядь.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu nɐ̃w ˈpɔdɨ seɾ ˈsɛɾju fɔˈdasɨ

translations.text: This can’t be serious, fuck.

phrases.pt: Estou mesmo saturado desta porcaria.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou ˈmẽmu sɐtuˈɾadu ˈdɛʃtɐ puɾkɐˈɾiɐ

translations.text: I’m really sick of this crap.

phrases.pt: Tudo isto é uma perda de tempo do caralho.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtudu ˈiʃtu ɛ ˈumɐ ˈpɛɾdɐ dɨ ˈtẽpu du kɐˈʎaɾu

translations.text: All of this is a fucking waste of time.

phrases.pt: Isto está a dar cabo de mim.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ʃˈta ɐ daɾ ˈkabu dɨ ˈmĩ

translations.text: This is fucking destroying me.

phrases.pt: Não tenho cabeça para esta merda hoje.
phrases.ru: Сегодня у меня нет головы на это дерьмо.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈtẽɲu kɐˈbesɐ pɐɾɐ ˈɛʃtɐ ˈmɛɾdɐ ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: I don’t have the head for this shit today.
